common.password_short: Password must be at least 6 characters

landing.subtitle: Add professional overlays, effects, and filters to your photos. Perfect for social media, marketing, and creative projects.
landing.features_subtitle: Professional tools that work right in your browser
landing.feature_overlays_desc: Collection of professional overlays for any style — from minimalist to dramatic.
landing.feature_blending_desc: Screen, multiply, overlay and other modes to create unique effects.
landing.feature_instant_desc: All changes in real-time. No waiting — see the result immediately.
landing.feature_quality_desc: Export in full resolution without quality loss.
landing.feature_export_desc: Download ready images in one click. PNG with transparency supported.
landing.feature_premium_desc: Exclusive overlay packs for subscribers with regular updates.
landing.steps_subtitle: Create stunning content in a minute
landing.step_1_desc: Drag and drop an image or select from gallery. JPG, PNG and WebP supported.
landing.step_2_desc: Browse collection and add effects you like. Adjust opacity and size.
landing.step_3_desc: Export in high quality. Ready for social media publishing!
landing.pricing_subtitle: Start for free, pay only for what you use
landing.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of creators already using Loverlay

auth.login_desc: Log in to access your account
auth.register_desc: Sign up to access premium features

editor.no_categories: No categories found. Create them in the admin panel.
editor.no_overlays_in_set: There are no overlays in this set yet.
editor.instructions_step1_desc: Drag and drop a file or click on the area in the center of the screen to select an image
editor.instructions_step2_desc: Browse categories on the left and click on your favorite overlay to add it
editor.instructions_step3_desc: Use the editor at the bottom to change opacity, rotation, scale and blend mode
editor.instructions_step4_desc: Click the 'Save' button in the top right corner to export the image
editor.locked_items_notice: All items are available after purchasing the set.

account.magic_link_info: We use magic link for login. No password required — just enter your email and we'll send you a login link.

free_weekly.title: Free Weekly Pack
free_weekly.description: Get a premium pack for free every week

legal.intro_text: These Terms are entered into by LevelUP. Loverlay is a digital product operated by LevelUP.
legal.product_desc: We provide digital overlays for image editing. Format: Digital-only content. Delivery: Instant online access, no physical shipping.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.text: We collect minimal data necessary for the service operation: email address for account creation. Payment information is processed securely by Paddle (our Merchant of Record) and is not stored on our servers.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.text: Your data is used solely to provide access to purchased digital content and manage your account.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell your personal data. Data is shared only with essential service providers like Paddle for payment processing.

refunds_page.title: Refund Policy
refunds_page.intro:
Loverlay provides digital goods (overlays).

We offer a 14-day refund window in accordance with Paddle’s refund policy and applicable consumer protection laws.

conditions.title: Refund Eligibility
conditions.text:
You may request a refund within 14 days of purchase in the following cases:
1. You are not satisfied with the product.
2. The product does not meet your expectations.
3. The product has technical issues that cannot be resolved.
4. You were charged twice due to a technical error.
5. A refund is required by applicable law.

After the 14-day period, refunds are generally not granted.

how_to.title: How to Request a Refund
how_to.text: To request a refund, please contact us within 14 days of purchase at support@loverlay.com and include your order details. We review refund requests within 3 business days.

non_refundable.title: Access and Use
non_refundable.text: By purchasing and downloading our digital products, you acknowledge that digital content is delivered immediately after purchase. This does not affect your statutory right to request a refund within the 14-day period.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to Loverlay. By accessing our website and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

license.title: 2. License
license.text: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use our overlays for personal and commercial projects as per the plan purchased.

restrictions.title: 3. Restrictions
restrictions.text: You may not resell, redistribute, or sublicense the overlays as standalone assets.
